hadiths.text: Asim said:"I read a book to Ash-Sha'bi in which it was narrated from Jabir that the Prophet said: 'A woman should not be taken as a co-wife to her paternal aunt or her maternal aunt.' He said: 'I heard that from Jabir

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ الْجَمْعِ بَيْنَ الْمَرْأَةِ وَخَالَتِهَا .
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Being Married To A Woman And Her Maternal Aunt At The Same Time
